page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO WANSDYKE
page.content: A sentinel guards our hilly parishes.Farmborough Common rises above our mainly rural landscape. Beneath it,mellow stone hamlets are scattered here and there,with Farmborough and Timsbury (where our school is,)being the major villages. A network of roads ensures easy reach of Bath and Bristol.However, this 'Green Belt'area has only minimal industry of its own, farming being the main one. Most of our spoken information came from the people of Timsbury. However,we did manage to venture along some distant lanes to complete our investigations. Of course,our sentinel didn't sound the alarm.He had seen it all before.......... .
